events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision involving their car and submitted initial claim details for assessment.
Claim department reviewed the case and categorised it under auto accident based on keywords and description.
Assigned assigned to the customer's case to handle all investigations and communication efficiently.
Customer received confirmation that their claim was acknowledged promptly and an agent will follow up shortly.
The agent requested photos of the damaged vehicle and a police report to proceed with the claim investigation.
Customer uploaded all requested documents including photos and police report to support the auto accident claim.
Investigation team began reviewing submitted evidence and contacted involved parties to establish fault in the collision.
Investigation concluded successfully determining liability and confirming the damages reported by the customer.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering the repair costs assessed for their damaged vehicle.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely updates throughout the process.
The insurance company formally approved the claim after customer agreement on the settlement terms.
Payment corresponding to the approved settlement amount was processed and issued to the customer promptly.
The claim case was officially closed after final payment and customer confirmation of issue resolution.
All claim documents and correspondence were archived systematically to maintain records for future reference.
